snippet: The speaker of the State House of Representatives told members to be prepared to return to the Capitol as soon as Dec. 3, a notice that could signal an impending vote on a pension overhaul.
lead_paragraph: The speaker of the State House of Representatives told members to be prepared to return to the Capitol as soon as Dec. 3, a notice that could signal an impending vote on a pension overhaul.

headline.main: Illinois: Signs of Life in Talks on a Pension Overhaul
headline.print_headline: Illinois: Signs of Life In Talks On a Pension Overhaul
